"No I'm Kyle! How did this happen Sonia??" She walked around you, taking in every detail.

"Your stupid wish came true! You wished to be me and now you are!"
153222222222222121.title: You arrive at Sonia's house.

1532222222222221212.content:
"Holy f*ck Sonia, what the hell do I do?! I can't go home looking like this, let alone go outside!"

Sonia sat down on her bed, completely at a loss for words. She kept staring at you up and down, trying understand what just happened. Meanwhile, you walked over to Sonia's closet and looked at yourself.

"This can't be happening...When I said I wanted to be you, I just meant that I wanted to be able to figure out that stupid math problem, not literally turn into you! What am I gonna do now?"

"You mean, what are WE going to do now." Sonia was standing next to you now, looking at the mirror. You two were a literal mirror image of each other, aside from the fact that one of you was topless. "You realize that this makes things complicated for me as well? Do you realize how weird this is, talking to a topless version of myself with an American accent? By the way, can you please put your shirt back on? Seeing myself naked isn't really making this any better."

"Fine, but seriously, what the hell are we going to do?" you said, as you picked up your shirt of the floor. "If I hide here for too long, people will think I’ve gone missing and you’ve murdered me or something. If I go out there, people are going to realize that there are two separate versions of you running around.”

Somehow, you managed to get the shirt on, which seemed to have expanded to accommodate for Sonia's rather generous bust. "That's weird.....my shirt doesn't feel tight or anything. It's almost as if it's expanded itself to fit my- I mean your body. And the same thing for my pants. I mean, if I got your hips and legs and everything else, it would've felt super tight, but...it doesn't..."

"Certainly strange but not the strangest thing-"

Sonia was interrupted by a sudden knock on the door. “It must be Mrs.Callaghan...______”
1532222222222221212.title: She stays the same.

choices: Skip to School the next day
15322222222222212122.content:
"...stay where you are!" whispered Sonia

You froze in place. There wasn't really another option for you at this point. You couldn't run into Sonia's closet or under her bed, and you definitely couldn't jump out her window. You braced yourself for the possible sh*tstorm to come as the door swung open. Sonia's host mother, Mrs.Callaghan walked in cautiously. "Everything alright in here? I heard screaming." She looked expectantly at you, then at Sonia, not even acknowledging the fact that there were now two Sonia's in the room. Your mouth opened to answer her question but before the words could even leave your mouth, Sonia swiftly replied.

"Oh it's nothing, I just saw a spider on my laptop, and Kyle got rid of it for me."

"Oh, alright then. Thought y'all might've been up to trouble or something else" chuckled Mrs.Callaghan, winking at you. Already dumbfounded by how she apparently saw nothing wrong with your condition, you smiled nervously and shook your head. "No, ma'am...uh..we're just doing math. Nothing else."

"Well then, I guess I'll leave you to it then. Wouldn't wanna keep you from your studies! Sonia dear, dinners ready at 7, alright?"

"Thanks Mrs.Callaghan, we'll wrap up by then."

Sonia's host mother closes the door behind her, leaving you two alone yet again. You turn to to Sonia, still confused. "What the hell just happened? Did she literally not notice what happened to me?"

Sonia sat down on her bed, her hand rubbing her forehead. She looked up at you strangely. "No, she didn't. And I'm going to guess we're the only two people who've noticed anything changed about you. But I want to be sure about this. Take your phone out."

"What, why?"

"Remember what you said about your clothes somehow adjusting themselves to fit you-I mean MY body?" She said indignantly. No doubt, she was still getting over the fact that she was looking a literal clone of herself. "Yeah, what about it?" you replied. "Well, what if that's not the only thing that changed? Open your phone and check your all profile and all your old pictures." You pulled out your phone and opened up the gallery. As you swiped through your photos, you realized that Sonia was right! Every single picture of you, had been replaced by a picture of Sonia, dressed in your clothes and in the same pose that you were. As you swiped through the photos, you couldn't help but notice a couple of beach photos where you had been wearing nothing but a pair of swim trunks, leaving Sonia's breasts out for all to see (not that anyone would care). Peering over your shoulder, Sonia grabbed the phone out of your hands after seeing you stop on that picture. Her eyes grew wide, but you couldn't tell if she was mad that you looked at the picture, or amazed at the extent of this apparent new reality.

"Oh my god..." she said, with her hand over her mouth.

"Uh, so....yeah...I guess...I'm still a guy? At least to everyone else?"

Sonia remained silent, staring at the phone. She appeared to be swiping through more of your pictures. You knew this was obviously a incredibly weird thing for her (as it was for you), so you let her be. You took out your wallet, and checked your new drivers license. Your birthday, name and gender remained the same, but your license now listed your new physical features, such as your long black hair, and your dark brown eyes, and-Wait no, you mean SONIA's hair and SONIA's eyes. You definitely did not want to start calling her body yours, and you didn't want to offend Sonia in any way.

"Kyle."

You turn around to look at Sonia, your new hair twirling as you did. "Yeah?"

"I think...I think you need to leave right now."

"Bu-"

"Look, I think we both need time to process what the hell just happened. And I need to do some research. Let's meet after school tomorrow, in the library. Alright? Alright, please just go now,"

You nodded, and started to pack your things. It was clear Sonia needed some time alone to wrap her head around the situation, and so did you. You manage to mumble a weak goodbye as you quickly exited her room, and made a beeline for the door.
